EntryName	ANO7_HUMAN
ProteinName	Anoctamin-7 (Dresden transmembrane protein of the prostate) (D-TMPP) (IPCA-5) (New gene expressed in prostate) (Prostate cancer-associated protein 5) (Transmembrane protein 16G)
GeneName	ANO7 NGEP PCANAP5 TMEM16G
Length	179
Function	Has calcium-dependent phospholipid scramblase activity; scrambles phosphatidylserine, phosphatidylcholine and galactosylceramide (By similarity). Does not exhibit calcium-activated chloride channel (CaCC) activity (PubMed:22075693). May play a role in cell-cell interactions (PubMed:17308099).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cell junction; Endoplasmic reticulum; Cytoplasm; Cytosol
Disorder
